meta.title: Online German Keyboard
meta.description: Easily type in German with our online Spanish keyboard - perfect for typing in Die deutsche Sprache.

faqs.question: How to use this German keyboard?
faqs.answer: This keyboard has been designed to mimic Microsoft's German IME and converts your QWERTY keyboard into a QWERTZ keyboard. On your keyboard you can now use the hyphen key (-) to type an Eszett (ß), an opening square bracket ([) for an umlauted u (ü), a semi-colon (;) for an umlauted o (ö) and an apostrophe (') for an umlauted a (ä). I am always looking to improve the keyboards on this site, so please let me know if you have any suggestions.
